column4: oh yeah when I installed ubuntu I made a partition for it on my harddrive but my windows partion only has 300 megs free of space is that dangerous ^^?
haha perhaps...but seriously I meant for system stability I do want to use it for gaming.
if you are really worried about it you can install gparted and give windows some more space.  You might need to boot with a live CD to do it though.
yes.  But you might need to boot with a live CD first.  That's because you can't change a partition while it is mounted.
